data.description:
Disclaimer: Advanced Skills in Foundry are treated like normal skills. 

If a character has one, they will need to manually edit the value on their character sheets, and remember to manually add their (A) skill dice to the prerequisite skills when rolling.

In addition, the Advance mode drop-down list will not correctly take into account the character point cost of engineering skills (which costs double the number before the D).
data.label: OD6S.CHAR_SKILLS
